item.title: 2021.10.25 patch notes (v112.01) | TERA KR
item.description: Update 1. Guild Conquest Ranked Battle Added ‘Guild Call’ tab to Guild UI, with Guild Conquest Ranked Battle event information Guild Conquest Tournament can be entered via ‘Donard’ NPC in Velika, Highwatch, Balderon Entry is limited from 1 Guild Member up to player limit stated on Guild Conquest Tournament information Guild Conquest Tournament is separated into Guild ranking and individual ranking, and reward is distributed to guild and individuals depending on rank Guild ranking is based on the sum of all guild members’ highest points Individual ranking is based on individual highest point 2.
